thread.section_title: BestForeignExchange Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of bestforeignexchange.com
thread.title: SANDHU-DICKENS

author: SANDHU-DICKENS
title: SANDHU-DICKENS
text: A good rate of exchange, efficient service. Note: you can only place the fast track order for collection the same day during opening hours. I did not realise this at first and was confused why my preferred branch was not appearing in the drop down menu. I phoned as soon as they opened and they explained to me. Everything went smoothly after that. I ordered and collected on a Sunday from Hammersmith branch.
